posts.message: #Ubuntu the great #Linux operating system has C# code in it. I love this language & I'll always be. http://www.ohloh.net/p/ubuntu
Good Software is like good art. It is never finished. It is only abandoned (Borrowing Da vinci's quote)
So  مُحَمَّد أبو آدم, we know you don't like mongoDB and why, what do you usually use instead?

posts.message: ايها الجيكس انى اريد انا اسال يعنى ايه ويندوز ازور Windows Azure بس بالعربى ربنا ينجحلكم ولادكم

Open source team chat, might be useful for anyone who wants to dabble in Elixir, Erlang's good looking friend. It uses Ember too for most of its client side.
Elixir smells like ruby but runs on the Erlang VM.
